item.title: Billie Bust Up ‘Playable Platforms’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Sing, spell, and soar.

Publisher Humble Games and developer Giddy Goat Games have released a new trailer for musical 3D platformer Billie Bust Up dubbed “Playable Platforms.”

Here is an overview of the game, via Humble Games:

About

Step into the spotlight and join Billie, a daring young goat on a quest to uncover the mystery of her father’s legacy and reclaim powerful magical abilities. Delve deeper into the adventure and take on exciting boss fights through rhythm-based combat that is sure to keep you on your feet. With equal parts humor, heart, and captivating music, Billie Bust Up offers a unique approach to the treasured mascot platformer.

Key Features

  • Move to the Music – Engage in rhythm-based battles where your attacks sync to the beat, and music adapts to your play style, creating dynamic, ever-changing gameplay experiences.
  • An Enchanting Ensemble – Team up with a quirky cast of heroes and villains, each with their own unique personalities and backstories, in a whimsical, adventurous tale.
  • For the Young at Heart – Inspired by animated classics, Billie Bust Up blends fantasy, humor, and heartfelt moments with a story of friendship, family, and hidden secrets.
  • Showstopping Songs – Experience character-driven songs composed by Daniel Ingram, with an optional sing-along mode to bring out your inner performer.
  • Embrace the Magic – Use a variety of magical abilities, from gliding with an umbrella wand to freezing enemies, solving puzzles, and vanishing into invisibility.
  • A Welcoming World – Customize your gameplay experience to suit your needs and preferences with a wide range of accessibility options. Tailor the game to be more accessible by enabling features like invincibility, low contrast mode for low vision, or turning off timed events. You can also adjust the difficulty with options such as one-hit mode, one-life mode, or a combination of both for more challenging playthroughs. Whether you’re looking for a more relaxed experience or seeking to push your skills to the limit, the game adapts to you.

Billie Bust Up will be available for PC via Steam. A release date has yet to be announced.

Watch the trailer below.

Playable Platforms Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/billie-bust-up-playable-platforms-trailer

item.title: Point-and-click adventure game Earth Must Die announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Revenge against Earth.

Publisher No More Robots and developer Size Five have announced Earth Must Die, a point-and-click adventure game coming to PC via Steam. A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via No More Robots:

About

From the desk of VValak Lizardtongue, Grand Shepherd of the Tyrythian Empire:

Well this is just complete and utter bullshit.

Those idiotic, moronic Terranoids think they can just roll in here and take over my beautiful Tyrythian kingdom? The kingdom that I built from the ground up with my bare hands, and only sort of inherited from my dear, sweet, extremely dead father?

Did I mention that this is bullshit?

It’s fine though, because what they don’t realize is that I am going to make them very, very dead. Along with my trusty sidekick and childhood nursing bot Milky—please do not ask me questions about that—I will whiz over to Earth, turn it into a stinking pile of rubble, and be back home in time for a warm glass of milk before bed.

Earth Must Die is the story of my glorious rise to power (off the back of my adored father’s passing), my subsequent accidental surrender to the Terranoids, and my infamous revenge against Earth and everything it stands for.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Apparently the story is retold in the form of one of those old point and click adventure games that people gave a shit about in the 1990s, I wanna say? But in 2025. Doesn’t sound like a good idea to me, but what do I know—I’m just a benevolent, terrifying leader of worlds who everyone loves and also super respects.

I’m also not sure what the phrase “British comedy royalty” is supposed to mean, but I guess they got a bunch of “funny” fuckwits to dub over my glorious voyage to feed the Terranoids their own arseholes? Let me just copy/paste the list here so I don’t have to give them any more time and effort than they deserve:

  • Joel Fry – Vvalak Lizardtongue
  • Martha Howe-Douglas – Milky
  • Alex Horne – Major Haskit, Bentik
  • Ben Starr – Krall, Danzan
  • Tamsin Greig – Rena, Blorr, Spiffy
  • Matthew Holness – Phelonius Skwid
  • Mike Wozniak – Willip, Jobson, Druce
  • Don Warrington – Quintarian
  • Stevie Martin – Skwidbot
  • Sophie Duker – Meebap
  • Emma Fryer – Parrach, Betsy
  • Alasdair Beckett-King – Oogles, Toilet, Vacuum, Village Elder
  • Rosie Holt – Chizz, Zarlaph, Karton
  • Jon Blyth – Fnaaaarglurp, Olkus
  • Julie Nolke – Grace Flufton
  • Sam O’Leary – Ian Gard, Ripper
  • Tom Lawrinson – Tree, Needledick
  • Sally Beaumont – Glushh, Big Snake
  • David Monteith – Allus, Pfysus, Marvap, Altican, Commandant
  • Inel Tomlinson – Cecil, Zertan, Robert Droid, Skwid Guards
  • Theo Leslie – Dinny

How do I not have someone to do this for me? Anyway, apparently my magnificent story is told over a series of many hours, and you click a bunch and things happen and really I don’t care about any of this, I’m just here for the glory.

You’ll be able to experience my unbelievably cool story through something called “Steam,” which is apparently how you access experiences like this back in 2025. Sounds primitive, but I guess every civilization has to start as gross slugs crawling their way onto the banks of the future.

VValak signing off.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/point-and-click-adventure-game-earth-must-die-announced-for-pc

item.title: Parasite Eve-inspired sci-fi horror RPG Parasite Mutant announced for PS5, PC
item.content:encoded:
Frontier Hunter: Erza’s Wheel of Fortune developer IceSitruuna has announced Parasite Mutant, a Parasite Eve-inspired science-fiction horror RPG set in the distant future. It will launch for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via IceSitruuna:

About

Parasite Mutant is a science-fiction horror RPG set in the distant future. Psionic agent Nova was sent on a mission to an abandoned and secluded island city filled with horrifying creatures, not knowing that what happened on the island will completely change her fate.

Key Features

  • Combat System – Parasite Mutant uses ATC (Active Time Chains) which combines the popular Active Time Battle system used in RPGs of the late-90s and a three-segment chain system. Players will need to time their actions on each segments and decide whether they want to save their energy and do a chain release. As the gauge fills up, players will need to dodge enemy attacks and launch their attack at the best possible time.
  • Art Style – Parasite Mutant uses a semi-realistic anime art style and utilizes modern rendering techniques to give our players a HD visual experience. Additionally, we have introduced a retro filter and CRT filter to bring players back that late-90s to 2000s vibe.
  • Setting – Parasite Mutant is a survival horror game with a diverse array of horrifying mutants. In the game, players will solve various puzzles in search of answers and maybe uncover the horrifying secret of this universe.
  • Level Up System – Parasite Mutant uses the classic equipment progression system. Players can attach various modules onto their equipment, or enhance their equipment using Plus Points that can be obtained through combat.
  • New Game+ – Parasite Mutant has a New Game+ mode that allows players to inherit Plus Points from their previous playthrough. The New Game+ mode unlocks new locations where players have to continue to strengthen themselves and complete the final challenge.
  • Outfit System – The game will feature an outfit‑changing system.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/parasite-eve-inspired-sci-fi-horror-rpg-parasite-mutant-announced-for-ps5-pc

item.title: Real Bout Fatal Fury 2: The Newcomers ‘NEO GEO Premium Selection’ edition with rollback netcode now available for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

A selection of NEO GEO titles upgraded with new features for the modern day.

SNK has released a new version of 1998-released fighting game Real Bout Fatal Fury 2: The Newcomers for PC via Steam for $19.99 / 2,980 yen as the first title in its new “NEO GEO Premium Selection“—a selection of NEO GEO titles upgraded with new features for the modern day. It includes rollback netcode with nine-player lobbies, Tournament and Spectator modes, a new training mode, and more.

Here is an overview of the game, via SNK:

About

Real Bout Fatal Fury 2: The Newcomers, the fighting game that first appeared in arcades back in 1998, makes its debut on Steam—with added online features and other fresh new features!

While preserving the original graphics and gameplay, the game now includes rollback netcode for smooth online matches.

Challenge players around the world in the highest-quality version of Real Bout Fatal Fury 2: The Newcomers ever!

Key Features

  • The Largest Roster in Fatal Fury Series History—23 Characters! – In addition to fan favorites like Terry Bogard and Mai Shiranui, the two titular newcomers Li Xiangfei and Rick Strowd join the fight! Including the hidden playable character Alfred, a total of 23 fighters are ready to rumble!
  • Smooth and Exciting Online Matches! – The new rollback netcode ensures responsive and competitive online play. With a lobby system that supports up to nine players and multiple tournament formats, such as single match, double elimination, and league play, the definitive Real Bout Fatal Fury 2: The Newcomers online experience has arrived. Time to bring the intense mind games of the perfected Line Sway system to online!
  • New features abound for Real Bout Fatal Fury 2: The Newcomers!
    • Enjoy the new Gallery Mode with 59 pieces of artwork, including key art and character illustrations!
    • Unlock achievements that let you use your favorites as an online avatar!
    • Practice Mode has also been enhanced with adjustable game speed and hitbox display features.
    • This version is packed with new features to give you the definitive Real Bout Fatal Fury 2: The Newcomers experience!

About NEO GEO Premium Selection

A definitive selection of NEO GEO titles reimagined to meet modern gaming needs.

Legendary NEOGEO arcade titles return in an updated form, enhanced with brand-new features! Immerse yourself in seamless online battles, a robust training mode, a content-rich gallery and jukebox, and more fresh additions. Play and prevail like never before! It’s NEO GEO, redefined. Prepare to be shocked once again by the meticulous polish only made possible by SNK.

Watch the launch trailer below. View a set of screenshots at the gallery.

Launch Trailer

English

Japanese

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/real-bout-fatal-fury-2-the-newcomers-neo-geo-premium-selection-edition-with-rollback-netcode-now-available-for-pc

item.title: Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage ‘Enter the World Stage’ trailer; open beta test set for October 1 to 6
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Fight your way to the top of the World Stage tournament.

Publisher SEGA and developer Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio have released a new trailer for Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage dubbed “Enter the World Stage,” and announced that an open beta test will run from October 1 to 6 across PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC.

Here is an overview of the game, via SEGA:

About

Countless Rivals. One Champion. Conquer the World Stage where Legends are made.

Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage launches on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and Steam on October 30 and introduces the brand-new World Stage mode, where you’ll face fierce opponents in global tournaments, conquer seven booths, and battle against rivals based on real-world player data to claim your place at the top as the ultimate fighter. The battle doesn’t end there. Sharpen your skills further and dive into side tournaments packed with unique matchups and even more challenges.

Additional Features

  • Cross-Play – Play seamlessly across PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and Steam with full rollback netcode support.
  • Improved Training Tools – new ways practice and master your favorite fighters

Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on October 30, followed by Switch 2 this winter.

Watch a new trailer below.

Enter the World Stage Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/virtua-fighter-5-revo-world-stage-enter-the-world-stage-trailer-open-beta-test-set-for-october-1-to-6
